ai-tha-ap328:1.2_0: while walking along I wandered about,
ai-tha-ap328:1.3_0: My goblins grief for a month,
ai-tha-ap328:1.4_0: he is the mark of a Build;
ai-tha-ap328:2.3_0: the Realized One, the perfected one,
ai-tha-ap328:3.2_0: with which my light was mine.
ai-tha-ap328:3.4_0: He rejoices in heaven for an eon.
ai-tha-ap328:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap328:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap328:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nādika.
